thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com | 3 of 35
thread.title: Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text: I was very surprised that they were able to help me get services in my location since we are in a very limited rural area. The service advisor who helped me set up each of my services and appointments was very nice and knowledgeable. I ended up getting more than what I initially called for because everything was at a much better price than what they offer locally. I would definitely recommend this company!
